gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 127, Hawks 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Wizards defeat the Hawks, 127-99. Kyle Kuzma led the Wizards with 29 points, six rebounds, and four assists as Deni Avdija (19 points, 14 rebounds, nine assists) and Jordan Poole (20 points) totaled 39 points. Trae Young led the Hawks with 21 points and 10 assists. The Wizards improve to 4-31 as the Hawks move to 15-23.
